quoteText:
You may terminate your access to the Service at any time for any reason without penalty by contacting us here, at which point you will no longer be permitted to use the Service.
We will not refund you the fees (or any part of them) that we have already charged you.
title: You cannot delete your account

tosdr.case: You cannot delete your account of this service
tosdr.tldr: It is impossible to delete your account from this service, according to the AccountKiller blacklist.
